author: "Lassels, Richard, 1603?-1668"
title: "The voyage of Italy. Or, A compleat journey through Italy ... Never before extant. With the characters of the people, and the description of the chief towns, churches ... libraries ... and antiquities. With instructions concerning travel / [Richard Lassel"
